🧮 Advanced Problem 1

A certain job needs:

24 days if done by A alone 18 days if done by B alone 9 days if done by C alone Starting on February 1st, the work begins with a 1-person daily rotation: A → B → C → A → B → …

Question: On what month and day will the job be completed?

📝 Hint

- Add the number of apples in each box.

- Simple addition!
